T01n899u_001:2: siddhaṃ prasiddhaṃ vijitāmaraṃ ca śāntaṃ virāgaṃ suviśuddhaśīlam |
T01n899u_001:3: viśveśvaraṃ sarvaguṇākaraṃ vai śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 1 ||
T01n899u_001:5: nīlotpalābhaṃ nayanaṃ viśālaṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 2 ||
T01n899u_001:13: śauddhodaniṃ lokavidaṃ munīndraṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 6 ||
T01n899u_001:16: traiduḥkhaduḥkhād bhayavedilokān trāṇaṃ ca nītuṃ varabodhimātraiḥ |
T01n899u_001:17: jihvā ca mattehi sucakṣu sarvaṃ śrīśākyasiṃhaṃ praṇamāmi nityam || 8 ||
